description: This file defines a MessagesController class for handling messaging-related API endpoints in a web application. It includes methods for sending messages and retrieving message conversation history between users.

classes.name: MessagesController
classes.description: Controller responsible for messaging API endpoints, including sending messages and retrieving conversations.

methods.name: Send
methods.description: Handles POST requests to send a message to a friend. It retrieves the current user ID, processes the message send request asynchronously, and returns the response.

methods.name: GetConversation
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve message history with another user, with options for pagination via 'take' and 'skip' parameters.
